subject: Re: JUnit 4.x and support for Java 1.4
msgSnippet: Mark, Could you clarify?  Perhaps a simple code sample of deriving a test case from any class ?  (I m not tracking with this.) _Marvin ... ... some small
messageBody:
Mark,

Could you clarify? Perhaps a simple code sample of "deriving a test
case from any class"? (I'm not tracking with this.)

_Marvin

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Mark Levison" <mlevison@...> wrote:
>
> Simply is a stylistic programming change - from "test" to "@Test".

... some small added value comes from being able to derive my test case
from any class (including Object).


Mark
